sentences.english: At last, the authors presented the standard to judge debris flow changing its course in grooves.
sentences.chinese: 创建了沟谷泥石流流通沟槽发生改道运动的判断标准。

sentences.english: Hippophae rhamnoides is a kind of pioneer plant in the gully slopes in Soft Sandstone Area (SSA) for eco-economical consideration.
sentences.chinese: 沙棘是砒砂岩区沟谷部位常用的一种生态恢复树种。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, the wild crabapple blossoms filled valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏时节，野生海棠花开满沟谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, full of wild crabapple valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏时节，野生海棠开满沟谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: The yield difference between ravine rainforest and secondary forest was not significant.
sentences.chinese: 沟谷雨林和次生林下阳春砂仁果实产量差异不显著。

sentences.english: This valley, also changed his name to a crabapple valley.
sentences.chinese: 这条沟谷，也就改名叫海棠峪了。

sentences.english: Diversity was high in the semi-sunny slope, semi-cloudy slope, gully and valley.
sentences.chinese: 在半阳坡和半阴坡和沟谷具有较高的物种多样性。

sentences.english: Along the way are remote mountains, deep valleys, so green, so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 沿途崇山峻岭，沟谷深陷，绿水青山，美轮美奂。

sentences.english: In contrast to those on the hilltop, plants at the foot gulch showed stronger tropical character.
sentences.chinese: 相比山顶而言，山脚沟谷的植物有很强的热带性。

definition: topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
